title.en: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer's First IRL Meet-Up

altTitles.ja: 53歳で初めてオフ会に参加しました

altTitles.ja-ro: 53-sai de Hajimete Off-kai ni Sanka Shimashita

description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

altTitles.ja: 永久機関

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

altTitles.en: My Elder Sister Is the Great Celebrity
My Elder Sister Is the Superstar

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ De Jiějiě Shì Dà Míngxīng

altTitles.vi: Chị Gái Tôi Là Đại Minh Tinh

description.en:
What? My elder sister, who is lazy, charming, and abusive, is not born of the same parents as me? What? She wants to be a Superstar, but fortunately, I have a system and a cheat. Help remove all obstacles in her way! What? My parents asked me to help solve her single status problem, but I’m still single! Why don’t you guys care for me? ! The system said: I think the two of you are quite suitable, and I will match you guys up. I won’t do it, As a brother, I will protest against it!

---

**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30704)
- [Alternative Raw (IQIYI)](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1hjftkhw59x.html)
description.id: Apa? Kakak perempuan yang sangat pemalas, cantik, dan kasar, tidak lahir dari orang tua yang sama denganku?  Apa? Dia ingin menjadi bintang besar, tapi untungnya, aku telah mendapat sistem dan jari emas yang benar. Anda harus membantu dia menghilangkan semua rintangan! Apa? Orang tuaku memintaku untuk membantunya memecahkan masalah lajangnya, padahal aku sendiri masih lajang!  Kenapa kau tidak memperdulikanku?! Sistem berkata: Aku pikir Anda berdua cukup cocok, jadi kenapa tidak.... Aku tidak akan melakukannya, aku protes, akan buruk jika sesama saudara saling....
description.vi: Cái gì? Chị gái thích ăn lười làm, xinh đẹp yêu nghiệt, lấy việc hành hạ tôi làm thú vui không ngờ lại không phải chị ruột? Cái gì? Chị ấy muốn làm đại minh tinh, cũng may có hệ thống bên cạnh, là công cụ hỗ trợ hình người. Dọn sạch trở ngại cho chị ấy! Cái gì? Ba mẹ muốn tôi giúp chị ấy giải quyết vấn đề độc thân, tôi còn đang độc thân đây này! Hai người tại sao không nghĩ cho con! Hệ thống nói: Ta thấy hai ngươi rất hợp nhau, ta sẽ tác hợp tác hợp. Tôi không làm, tôi phản đối, làm em trai đã đủ khổ rồi
description.zh: 什么？我那好吃懒做、红颜妖孽、虐我为乐的亲姐居然和我不是一个爸妈生的？ 什么？她想当大明星，幸好我系统加身，妥妥的人形金手指。帮她扫平一切障碍 ！ 什么？爸妈让我帮忙解决她的大龄单身问题，我都还单着呢！你们怎么不想想我 ？！ 系统说：我觉得你两就挺合适，我来撮合撮合。 我不干，我抗议，当弟弟就

altTitles.ja: 路傍のフジイ

description.en:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

title.en: Watashi no "Ouji-sama" ga Sanjigen-ka shita no desu ga - Otaku na Watashi to Dousei & Real Renai shiteimasu!?

altTitles.ja: 私の“王子様”が三次元化したのですが　～オタクな私と同棲＆リアル恋愛しています!?～
私の“王子様”が三次元化したのですが

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no "Ouji-sama" ga Sanjigen-ka shita no desu ga

altTitles.en: My "Prince" Became 3D - I, an Otaku, Am Living Together and Having a Real Romance with Him!?

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的王子大人竟然三次元化了

altTitles.zh: 我的王子大人竟然三次元化了

description.ja: 「たいしたキスもできねーくせに、大人をナメんなよ」生まれてから24年間、三次元の男性に興味を持てずにいた乙女ゲーオタクの薫子。ところが両親から勧められたお見合いで、推しとそっくりなイケメン御曹司・時織司と出会い大興奮！「次元を超えて会いに……!?」速攻で結婚を申し込むも、すげなくお断りをされてしまう。画面の中の王子様と違い、常に塩対応の司。しかし、薫子は初めてリアルな男性に感じたときめきを忘れられず、司攻略を決意する…！「本当に、変な奴だな…」どんなに突き放してもめげない薫子に、司の氷の仮面も少しずつ剥がれていって――。平凡オタク女子がレベルMAXの攻略対象に挑む、ハイテンションラブコメディ！

altTitles.ja: 娘の寝室

altTitles.vi: Phòng ngủ của con gái tôi

description.en: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
description.ja: 実の娘とセックスをした――もちろん夢の中で。大学講師の後藤は幸福な家庭を築いていた。美しい画家の妻、可愛く優秀な子供たち‥‥しかし、その幸福はハリボテだった。昼には妻の不貞を疑い、夜は悪夢に悩まされる日々の中で後藤の精神は擦り切れていく。そんなある日、帰宅した後藤が見たのは荒らされた自室で涙を流す娘の姿。妻の犯行と確信した後藤は大切な家族を自分が守ると決意するが‥‥!?
description.vi: Goto, một giảng viên đại học đang tận hưởng cuộc sống gia đình đầm ấm bên vợ mình là một nữ họa sĩ ăn khách xinh đẹp cùng hai người con. Nhưng rồi khi bắt đầu nảy sinh mối hiềm nghi vợ mình ngoại tình, cộng thêm bản thân đang bị một cơn ác mộng giày vò đã khiến tâm trí anh trở nên ngày càng suy sụp thấy rõ. Bỗng một ngày nọ khi vừa đi làm về, Goto phát hiện phòng ngủ của con gái mình bị ai đó phá tan hoang, và con gái anh đang ngồi khóc trên sàn. Tin rằng những hành động điên rồ này là chỉ có thể là do vợ làm ra, Goto liền quyết định sẽ đứng lên bảo vệ gia đình nhỏ của mình.

altTitles.ja: ベノム 求愛性少女症候群

altTitles.es: Venom: Síndrome de las Chicas que Buscan Amor

description.en:
Loneliness is like poison, I have nothing, I'm a failure, I'm a failure, and so on... In a social networking site where girls vent their pain, she comes across a rumor of "Courtship Girl Syndrome," which only teenage girls are affected by. She thought it was just a myth, a disease with a cute name and symptoms like those of a manga character. However, the abnormalities that began to occur in the girl's body as a result of a certain problem are very similar to the rumors...?

We are affected by the blue spring disease.
description.es: Venom, Darling Dance, Failure Girl y otras famosas canciones de la popular vocaloid P, Kairiki Bear, han sido convertidas en "Historias". ¡La soledad es como el veneno, no tengo nada, soy un fracaso, soy una fracasada, etc.! En una red social donde la chica desahoga su dolor, se topa con el rumor del "Síndrome de las chicas que buscan amor", que solo afecta a las adolescentes. Pensó que era solo un mito, una enfermedad con un nombre bonito y síntomas como los de un personaje de manga. Sin embargo, las anomalías que empezaron a producirse en el cuerpo de la chica como consecuencia de cierto problema son ¿muy parecidas a los rumores...? Estamos afectadas por la enfermedad de la primavera azul.
description.id:
Venom, Dari Dance, Failure Girl, dan lagu-lagu terkenal lainnya oleh vokaloid populer P, Kairiki Bear, telah diubah menjadi "Cerita"!

Kesepian sama seperti racun, aku tidak punya apa-apa, aku gagal, aku gagal, dan seterusnya... Di situs jejaring sosial tempat para gadis melampiaskan rasa sakit mereka, dia menemukan rumor "Sindrom Gadis Berpacaran," yang hanya berpengaruh pada gadis remaja.
Dia pikir itu hanya mitos, gejala penyakit dengan nama yang imut seperti karakter manga. Namun, kelainan yang terjadi di tubuh gadis itu sangat mirip dengan rumor...?
Kami terjangkit penyakit musim semi biru.
description.ja: 「孤独って毒みたい」「私には何も無い」「自分は失敗作だから」―― そんな苦しさを吐き出すためのSNSの裏アカで少女が目にしたのは、10代の女子だけが発症するという『求愛性少女症候群』の噂。カワイイ名前にマンガのキャラクターみたいな症状でできているそんな病、ただの作り話だと思っていた。 けれど、ある悩みをきっかけに少女の身体に起き始めた異常は、その噂とよく似ていて――？私たちは、青い春の病に侵されている。

altTitles.ja: 失敗作の使い魔と魔術師の話

altTitles.en: A Failure of a Familiar and a Mage

description.en: A mage adopts an abandoned familiar. After 80 years of raising her and trying to teach her magic and emotion, he passes away, and she embarks on a journey to help other abandoned familiars and tour the spots that remind her of her late master.
description.pt-br: Um Oneshot sobre o relacionamento de um mago e uma familiar abandonada, o que esperar dessa história?!

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...
description.vi: Yuji Kamome, một nhà báo tự do đã mất đi đứa con gái yêu quý của mình trong một vụ tai nạn. Trong cơn tuyệt vọng, vợ anh cũng đã rời bỏ anh, để mặc anh trải qua những tháng ngày trống rỗng. Tuy nhiên, một ngày nọ, một tờ rơi từ một giáo phái kỳ lạ mang tên "Tâm Tiếu Hội" tìm đến và thay đổi số phận của anh. Và trong bức ảnh trên tờ rơi đó anh đã nhận ra được người vợ đã biệt tăm biệt tích suốt thời gian qua của mình. Một câu chuyện về sự cuồng tín và điên rồ của con người. Thứ bóng tối tà đạo mà nụ cười ma quái đó đang mời gọi là gì?

title.en: Moratta Mittsu no Hazure Skill, Awasetara Saikyou Deshita

altTitles.ja: 貰った三つの外れスキル、合わせたら最強でした

altTitles.en: The Three Skills I Received, When Combined, Were The Most Powerful

altTitles.id: Tiga keterampilan tidak biasa yang saya terima adalah yang terkuat jika digabungkan.

altTitles.pt-br: As Três Habilidades que Recebi, Quando Combinadas, Eram as Mais Poderosas

description.en:
Mutou Kushina's life, filled with brutality, came to an abrupt end. In his new incarnation, the goddess granted him three abilities: [Super Speedy Regeneration], [Agelessness], and [Grit: Indomitable Spirit]. However, those skills were outlier skills that were not offensive skills!

The place where he was reborn with such skills is the Forest of Endless Calamity, where a large number of Danger Level S monsters roam, one of which is capable of destroying the world. Having no offensive skills, Kushina's should have been killed by the monsters right away, but...? With all three skills, he can instantly regenerate no matter what kind of attack he receives! And every time he is attacked, he gets stronger and stronger...
description.ja:
壮絶な前世の末、命を落とした少年・無倒屈止無（むとう くしな）。転生する際に女神に貰ったのは【超速再生】【不老】【根性：不撓不屈】という３つのスキル。しかし、それらのスキルは攻撃系のスキルではない外れスキルだった！

そんなスキルを持って転生した先は、“危険度S”の1匹で世界を滅ぼせる程のモンスターが大量に闊歩している【果ての災厄の森】。攻撃系のスキルを持たない屈止無はすぐにモンスターに殺されるはずだったが……？３つのスキルを組み合わせたらどんな攻撃を受けても瞬時に再生！しかも攻撃される度に強くなっていき―
description.pt-br: Mutou Kushina, após uma vida brutal, é reencarnado por uma deusa em um mundo cheio de monstros de Nível de Perigo S. Com habilidades aparentemente inúteis - [Regeneração Super Rápida], [Imortalidade] e [Determinação: Espírito Indomável] - ele deveria ter sido morto imediatamente. No entanto, essas habilidades permitem que ele se regenere instantaneamente e fique mais forte a cada ataque. Agora, ele deve enfrentar os desafios da Floresta das Calamidades Infinitas e descobrir seu verdadeiro potencial.

title.en: Kono Yo wa Tatakau Kachi ga Aru

altTitles.ja: この世は戦う価値がある

altTitles.en: This World is Worth Fighting For

altTitles.vi: Thế giới này đáng để đấu tranh

description.en:
Kiri Ito, third year in the company. She faces a pile of energizer, a bad job, a sexually harassing workplace, and a morally harassing boyfriend. In the midst of her daily life, she is trying to survive with only one thing in mind: "I want to be useful to other people. In it was a card. It was her right to live freely."

At the age of 25, the end of a life of dedication. And the biggest and last revenge of her life begins!
description.ja:
伊東紀理(いとうきり)、社会人3年目。積まれるエナドリ、仕事不調、セクハラ職場にモラハラ彼氏。「人の役に立ちたい」一心で生き抜く日々に、一通の封書が届く。そこに入っていたのは1枚のカード。それは、彼女が自由に生きる権利となった。

25歳、捧げるだけの人生の終わり。そして、人生最大最後のリベンジが始まる！

altTitles.ja: BEAT＆MOTION
ビートアンドモーション

description.en: Tatsuhiko's love for drawing began at a young age, and his aspiration was to work in animation someday. But when the young boy is bullied for his art, Tatsuhiko swears to never draw in front of others ever again. Desperate to find something new to fill the void in his heart, he turns to music, but eventually becomes jaded by his mediocrity.While out drinking with his friends, Tatsuhiko's sob story earns the ire of a drunk woman, who intimidates the young man into reassessing his attitude toward life. He decides to give animation another chance, and in the process rediscovers his love for the medium, pushing himself to publish a short video. Tatsuhiko is stunned when the video goes viral, even more so when his favorite singer, Nico Kashiwagi, requests a collaboration on her next music video!Excited to finally meet the artist he has admired for so long, the young man is shocked to discover that Nico is the same bar patron that gave him an earful, though she has no recollection of that drunken night. While initially hesitant of their new partnership, Tatsuhiko slowly learns that there is more to Nico's brutish passion than he realizes.
description.ja: 夢を諦め、鬱屈した日々を送っていた竜彦は、飲み会で出会った破天荒な少女の言葉をきっかけにかつてのようにアニメーターを志す。自主制作アニメがSNSでバズり、憧れのミュージシャン・ニコからMV制作を依頼されるが、その正体は飲み会で出会った少女で…!?

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

altTitles.ja: 夜の命名法

altTitles.vi: Mệnh Danh Thuật Của Bóng Tối

description.en: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.
description.zh: 蓝与紫的霓虹中，浓密的钢铁苍穹下，数据洪流的前端，是科技革命之后的世界，也是现实与虚幻的分界。 钢铁与身体，过去与未来。 这里，表世界与里世界并存，面前的一切，像是时间之墙近在眼前。 黑暗逐渐笼罩。 可你要明白啊我的朋友，我们不能用温柔去应对黑暗，要用火。

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの最強テイマー、使い魔は幼馴染

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukai ma wa Osananajimi

altTitles.en: The Strongest Tamer Returned From Another World With His Childhood Friend as His Familiar

altTitles.id: Penjinak Terkuat Kembali Dari Dunia Lain Dengan Teman Masa Kecilnya sebagai Familiarnya

description.en:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
description.ja: 「でも私、ご主人様の渉（わたる）がいないと何もできないよ？」　異世界に突然召喚され、危機を救った高校生の渉と瑠美は、無事に現実世界へと帰還した。しかし、戻ってきたはずの現実世界は様変わりしていて、ダンジョンが発生し、人類はスキルに目覚め、まるで異世界と同じような世界になっていて…　異世界帰りのテイマー・渉と、その使い魔・瑠美。幼馴染以上恋人未満の最強コンビが無双するダンジョンファンタジー

altTitles.ja: 両手を広げて

description.en:
Thrown unwillingly into a bloody war, one young man nears the end of his lonely journey home.
However, he carries with him a dreadful curse, cast upon him in battle...
The winner of the 2024 MAGIC International Manga Contest!

Source: MangaPlus
description.ja:
望まぬ戦争に駆り出され、生き延びた青年は一人帰路に着く。
しかし、彼は戦いの中で恐ろしい呪いにかけられていて…。
MAGIC国際漫画賞、大賞受賞作!!

description.en: Lu Nanzhi reincarnated into a stand-in romance novel as vicious female rival, and her task is to make the heroine Chen Xi achive happiness. The industry beauty thought that attacking the heroine was also a way to ‘make the heroine happy’, so she took the initiative to pursue the heroine. But she gradually felt that the attitude towards herself from the surrounding characters seemed to be different from that in the book?

title.en: Falling in the Night with You

altTitles.en: Fall in the Night with You

description.en:
The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi’s life. The two help each other’s growth, Ren Xi’s willing to help Nyx to find her lost memories, but in the process, will discover an astonishing secret……  
  
L'apparition soudaine d'une sorcière amnésique, Nix, amène beaucoup de changements dans la vie du jeune Ren Xi. Ren Xi veut aider Nix à retrouver ses souvenirs. Cette quête leur fera découvrir un secret incroyable…

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Aim for a Luxury Cruise Ship!!: Obtain a Rich Life in Another World with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

altTitles.ja: 異世界ウォーキング

description.en:
Ordinary student Sora has been summoned to another world as one of seven "chosen heroes" meant to battle the Demon King. While the other six are blessed with grandiose titles and superlative stats, Sora is stuck with no title, no level, and a single, underwhelming skill: he never gets tired from walking. After being judged useless to the cause, Sora is thrown out into the streets and left to fend for himself. Nevertheless, he grows determined to turn his unjust treatment and seemingly "useless" skill into a positive by earning money, making friends, and seeing sights he's never seen before!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/isekai-walking)
description.ja: 異世界に召喚された少年ソラは、勇者として魔王と戦うことを命じられる。しかし与えられた「ウォーキング」スキルの効果は、どんなに歩いても疲れないだけ! 国王から見放され、追放されたソラであったが、一度異世界へ足を踏み出すと突然レベルアップ!? 実は「ウォーキング」には「1歩進むごとに経験値１を獲得する」という隠し効果があったのだ!! その経験値で様々なスキルを獲得、歩くごとに万能となっていくソラは、のんびり気ままな異世界の旅へと歩み出す!!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

altTitles.ja: アンラッキーヤングメン

description.en:
Tokyo, 1968: between political turmoil and student riots N, a man with a criminal past, 
casually meets T, a young comedian intent on making a career in the film industry. 
T wants to shoot "Unlucky Young Men", a chronicle of a disillusioned Japanese youth
ready to do anything to realize their dreams; to finance the film, 
the two begin to plan attacking a van carrying 300 million yen...

altTitles.ja: 荷物持ちの脳筋無双

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?
description.ja: 大量のアイテムを持つことができるユニークスキル【荷物持ち】を持つ少年・リュック。彼は、Sランクパーティー「慧眼の黒獅子」の雑用係としてこき使われていた。そんな日常を過ごす中、パーティーはリュックのスキルより便利な収納アイテムが手に入れる事に成功。不要となったリュックは危険なダンジョン内で追放をされてしまう。絶望的な状況に陥った彼だったが、突如現れた巫女少女・ミオと出会ってーーー？
description.pt-br: Quanto mais ele carrega, mais forte ele fica! Uma fantasia incomparável da dupla de aventureiros mais fraca! Ryuk, um garoto com uma habilidade única “Porter”, que lhe permite carregar uma enorme quantidade de itens, estava sendo explorado como ajudante de tarefas para o grupo S-rank “Black Lion of Foresight .” Um dia, o grupo conseguiu adquirir um item de armazenamento mais conveniente do que a habilidade de Ryuk, portanto não mais necessário, Ryuk é banido para uma masmorra perigosa. Desesperado nesta situação desesperadora, de repente ele conhece uma donzela do santuário, Mio - e então?

altTitles.ja: くじ引き特賞：無双ハーレム権

description.en: I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.
description.ja: 福引で特賞を引き当てた少年・結城カケル。彼が受け取ったのは“異世界転移”と“あらゆる能力が777倍”になる権利だった!?
description.pt:
Um virgem que ganha na loteria e como prêmio pode ir para outro mundo e escolher seu poder.  


---

  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/de3a938b85-e9d2-4f4d-9161-49b2f44782a3/)
description.pt-br:
Ganhei na loteria do Shopping District o privilégio de ir para outro mundo.  

Depois de sortear várias bolas, inesperadamente ganhei uma habilidade semelhante a uma trapaça. Com esse poder, satisfarei todos os meus desejos e terei o meu próprio harem!

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku wa Konyaku Haki Nante Shimasenkara ne
Boku ha Kon'yaku Haki Nante Shimasen kara ne

altTitles.en: I'm Not Breaking Off The Engagement
I Won't Be Breaking Off This Engagement. You Know That, Right?

altTitles.ko: 나는 약혼 파기 따위 하지 않을 거예요

description.en:
"Ah… Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"  
  
The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!  
  
This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate.
___
**Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)

For centuries, adventurers have slaughtered monsters for sport and hunted goblins for their body parts and linens. But why? This is the question, Nog, the goblin inventor, has been trying to answer. After accidentally unlocking an arcane power that allows Nog to "level up" and grow in strength, he finally discovers the confidence to chase the answer to his question. Nog will set on a perilous quest across the world with his best friend, Gubble, to discover why humans hunt goblins! Can monsters and adventurers live in peace?
description.pt-br: Durante séculos, os aventureiros massacraram monstros por esporte e caçaram goblins por suas partes do corpo e tecidos. Mas por quê? Essa é a pergunta que Nog, o goblin inventor, está tentando responder. Após desbloquear acidentalmente um poder arcano que permite que Nog “suba de nível” e ganhe força, ele finalmente descobre a confiança para buscar a resposta para sua pergunta. Nog partirá em uma perigosa jornada pelo mundo com seu melhor amigo, Gubble, para descobrir por que os humanos caçam goblins! Será que os monstros e os aventureiros podem viver em paz?

description.en: The highly acclaimed sixth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Italy to America, as Jolyne Cujoh—daughter of Jotaro Kujo—is sentenced to 15 years in prison for a murder she didn’t commit! In a bizarre turn of events, the prison is filled with Stand users. Some become her allies, but many are sent to kill Jolyne and her friends in a scheme to resurrect the scourge of the Joestar family—DIO! It’s a battle for survival in a prison where death lurks around every corner while Jolyne fights to save her father’s life in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 6—Stone Ocean!
description.it: La storia della figlia di Jotaro Kujo, Jolyne Cujoh. È stata accusata di un omicidio e finisce nella prigione di Green Dolphin Street. Suo padre gli ha dato un amuleto, con cui si ferisce la mano e sblocca la sua abilità stand, Stone Free, che permette di trasformare il suo corpo in una stringa comandabile. La stringa può creare uno stand umanoide che arriva fino a 2 metri dal suo corpo, e può estenderlo come il filo. Nella prigione trova preso degli alleati portatori di Stand come Hermes (Kiss) e Foo Fighters.
description.kk: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken (ДжоДжоның шытырман хикаясы) сериясының алтыншы оқиғалы доғасы.Джотаро Куджоның қызы Джолин Куджоның оқиғасы. Ол кісі өлтіргені үшін сотталып, Green Dolphin Street түрмесінде қалады. Оған әкесінен қалған тұмар беріледі, ол оның қолын кесіп, оның денесін тірі жіпке айналдыруға мүмкіндік беретін Stone Free қабілетін ашады. Жіп оның денесінен 2 метр қашықтықта гуманоидтық тірек жасай алады және одан әрі жіп ретінде созылуы мүмкін. Түрмеде ол көп ұзамай сотталған әріптестерімен және Эрмес (Kiss) және Foo Fighters стендінің пайдаланушыларымен одақтас болады.
description.es-la: La historia de la hija de Jotaro Kujo (Parte 3), Jolyne Kujo. La acusan de un asesinato y termina en la prisión de Green Dolphin Street. Le dan un amuleto heredado de su padre, que le hace un corte en la mano y hace aparecer su stand, Stone Free, que le permite desenredar su cuerpo en una cuerda a su control. La cuerda puede tener una forma humanoide en el rango de 2 metros desde su cuerpo, y puede extenderse más como una cuerda. En la prisión, pronto se vuelve aliada con sus compañeros convictos y usuarios de Stand, Hermes (Kiss) y Foo Fighters (Goo Goo Dolls).

description.en: Xiao Lin, the young master of the tycoon family, became a super negligent overnight. The twelve gold hairpins, the principal and the deputy, are all elite goddesses from all walks of life. Xiao Lin can only continue his life if he completes the contract with them. So Xiao Lin was forced to embark on the path of the hunting goddess.
description.zh: 【每周三、六更新】财阀家大少爷萧麟一夜之间变成了超级负翁，世态炎凉，祸不单行，惨遭误杀之际，激活了契约系统。正副十二金钗，全都是各行各业倾国倾城的精英女神，萧麟只有与她们完成契约，才能得以续命。于是萧麟被迫走上了狩猎女神的道路。

description.en: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
description.ja: 俺・中村照秋は、沖縄に転校し、好きな人も出来たが、喜屋武さん(好きな人)の方言が分からない。好きな人の方言を通訳してくれる比嘉さんには、いつも助けられてばかりいる…。 南の島でちょっぴり変わった異文化恋愛スタート‼
description.ru: Я, Тэруаки Накамура, перевёлся в школу на Окинаве и влюбился в девушку по имени Кян-сан, но я не понимаю её диалект. Хига-сан всегда помогает мне, переводя диалект. На южном острове начинается несколько иная культурная любовь.
description.pt-br: Eu, Nakamura Teruaki, me transferi para Okinawa e estou apaixonado pela Kyan, mas não entendo seu dialeto. Higa está sempre me ajudando interpretando o dialeto... Um romance intercultural um pouco incomum em uma ilha tropical está prestes a começar!

description.en:
Yuta was your typical introverted loser.

One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn.

Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...?

---

The serialized version of the original webcomic A Woman Who Will Mess Up Your Emotions.

altTitles.ja: 日替わり尻尾の尾崎ちゃん

description.en: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
description.ja: 毎日尻尾が生え変わる女子高生、尾崎詩穂（おざきしほ）。彼女の誘いで毎日のように体育倉庫を訪れる先輩は、今日も尻尾で、耳で、なすがままにされてしまう。

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

The Ugly Duckling Becomes the Empire’s Top Celebrity! Juliet Karenina, the era’s hottest celebrity, wakes up in the body of noblewoman Louvetria Diorlos in another world. Faced with a clumsy body and a timid personality, Louvetria endures bullying from those around her: Twins who mock and ostracize her. Her unrequited love, Kedric, who scowls at her. Her step-grandmother, Molga, who torments her in secret. But with Juliet’s spirit inside her, Louvetria won’t tolerate it anymore. “I won’t stand for this, no matter who it is. “Louvetria’s bold transformation begins!

altTitles.ja: 天より高く

description.en: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

altTitles.ja: 戦姫サバイバルサガ〜異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊〜
戦姫サバイバルサガ-異世界の運命をかけた無人島フジュン異性交遊-

description.en:
Anastasia, an elf renowned as a once-in-a-millennium magical talent, faces the final battle of a three-way war in another world. In the midst of battle with her arch enemies, the demon race, Anastasia is enveloped in an intense light and, when she awakens, finds herself on an uninhabited island. As Anastasia strolls around the island, a mysterious human appears before her, but she can no longer use magic...!?

A survival comedy featuring the most powerful and beautiful girls from another world and an older man washed ashore on an uninhabited island!

(Source: Kadokawa)
description.ja:
千年に一人と言われる魔法の才能を持つエルフ・アナスタシアは、異世界で三つ巴の戦争の最終決戦へと赴く。
仇敵である魔族との戦いの最中激しい光に身を包まれたアナスタシアが目を覚ますとそこは、無人島であった。
無人島を散策するアナスタシアの前に謎の人間が現れ、しかも魔法が使えなくなっており…！？
異世界から来た最強美少女たちと無人島に流れ着いたオッサンによるサバイバルコメディ！

description.en:
A magic fanatic's life came to an end after a dreadful encounter with the nobles who ended his life with a powerful spell. His last wish, being able to study and master more magic, has been answered when he was reincarnated as Lloyd de Saloom, the 7th prince of Saloom Kingdom. Being the last prince in line with no right to compete for the throne, Lloyd is basically allowed to live as he likes, allowing him to perfect his magic as he pleases…

[Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/i-was-reincarnated-as-the-7th-prince-so-i-can-take-my-time-perfecting-my-magical-ability/)
description.ja: 「魔術を極めたい！」たった一つの想いを残し死んだ男は、生前の記憶を残したままサルーム国の第七王子として転生を果たした！ 前世とは異なる桁違いの魔力量。第七王子という自由な身分。最高の環境で少年ロイドは魔術浸りの生活を望むが…。

altTitles.ja: ヒミツのヒロコちゃん

description.en:
I've always loved you. That's why whether in sickness or in heath, I want to walk beside you...

I went to Hanafuu University, a different school than my best friend, Aiko. I'm sad to be separated from Aiko, but I thought I would be fine if I can be with my lover, Ritsu... but he's been busy with the opening of his second store, and we can hardly meet. I don't want to bother him, so I pretend to be mature and behave myself, but it seems like I've made a mistake...?!

title.en: Sasotta no wa Socchidesho ~Joushi to Buka, Megasametara Love Hotel deshita.~

altTitles.en: You Came on to Me First
誘ったのはそっちでしょ～上司と部下、目が覚めたらラブホでした。～

description.en: Nao and her boss, Seiya, get along about as well as a cat and a dog at work. When they go out to drink with coworkers, they get in a big fight… or so Nao thought, but when she woke up, she was in bed with him at a love hotel! The next day Nao doesn't know how to act in front of Seiya at the office… but when they talk, they get in another big fight about who invited who to the love hotel… that leads to them kissing again. And then he says, "If we repeat that night, we'll probably remember…" Nao knows that's just an excuse, but she can't resist…
description.zh-hk:
一次公司酒会，秋草奈央和上司寺岛诚也大吵一架。  
隔日，在陌生的酒店里醒来时，却发现这位上司就睡在旁边…  
莫名其妙的一夜情到底是谁先主动诱惑？当时的寺岛似乎对她说了什么…可是宿醉之后的秋草完全忘记了醉酒时候发生的事情。  
或许，再做一次可以回想起来？

altTitles.ja: 陽キになりたい時雨さん

description.en:
Yoshida is a gloomy second year middle school student whose precious youth has been spent stuck in the corner of his class without being able to make any friends.

Shigure is the girl who sits next to him in class and she is as gloomy as he is. One day, she struck up a conversation with Yoshida and declared,

"I'm going to become a cheerful person!"

Thus begins Yoshida and Shigure's battle to become cheerful people in their effort to spend a brighter youth.
description.ja: 友達もおらず、教室の隅でくらい青春を過ごす中学2年生の陰キャ・吉田。 ある日、教室で話しかけてきたのは隣に座る同じく陰キャの同級生女子・時雨さんだった。 彼女は言った、「私は陽キャになるのだ！！」と！ 明るい青春を過ごすため、吉田と時雨さんの陽キャを目指すバトルが始まる…！

description.en: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
description.ja: 新種の性感染症が世界中で流行。感染すると女性は性欲が数十倍に、男性は99%が死亡する。「安易な性行為=死」となった世界。性経験のない主人公・神童貞雄は、ワクチンが開発されるまで、誰とも関係を持たないことを誓うが、女性たちの誘惑が彼を襲いーー!?

Under immense pressure to achieve academically both at school and at home, Minedera Zen turns to taking upskirt photos of girls as a form of escape from his life. One day, while doing his usual rounds, Zen is caught by the subject of his upskirt at the time, Houjou Ayame…

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: 傍観者の恋

description.en:
"I want to be by my sister's side until the last moment..."

In the fall of her twenties, Rachel married her childhood friend Noah, who had been her longtime crush.
She knows that the person Noah really loves is Alicia, his older sister and Rachel's best friend...
Noah and Rachel live a married life full of deceit while Alicia has only a short time left to live.
Rachel feels as much guilt and heartache as she does happiness, but who is the real 'bystander' in this love?

The long-awaited first volume of the comic adaptation of the pinnacle of "a fake marriage of unrequited love" that wrenches the heart with hidden love, irreplaceable friendship, and the sadness of passing each other!

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
"Why did that happen?!"

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let's take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: 両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが
